title: Ersa
extract:
In Greek mythology, Ersa or Herse (Ancient Greek: Ἕρσα "dew") is the goddess of dew and the daughter of Zeus and the Moon (Selene), sister of Pandia and half-sister to Endymion's 50 daughters.

Notes
